Person.Organization: HUGO W. MOSER RES INST KENNEDY KRIEGER

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap. Samples and associated phenotype data for the study "DNA in Children with Developmental Disabilities" were provided by Jonathan Pevsner, Ph.D.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: The annual progress report should cite work done that relates specifically to this dataset [Genetic Basis of Developmental Disabilities] and not just a generic report for a series of datasets that may also have been requested at the same time.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Developmental Disabilities, GSO, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-DD-GSO-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Developmental Disabilities and related disorders. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
"Developmental Disabilities" includes conditions affecting children with evidence of genetic relationshipssuch as intellectual disability, autism and autism-related disorders, neurobehavioral disorders, and attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
